answers.answer: Your pregnancy was complicated. Very HBP can damage the eye. Get in to see an Eye MD ophthalmologist soonJCH MD
Thank you. Yes it was a complicated pregnancy that resulted in me having hb as well as type 2 diabetes i Will definitely look into this further.
Ask your OB doctor or family doctor to refer you to Eye MD ophthalmologistJCHMD

Went to see an eye specialist yesterday who did a dilated eye exam and said everything is perfectly fine and there is nothing wrong with my eyes. Now today I happened to notice that my right pupil is still dilated and my left eye has returned to normal. Is this normal after having a dilated eye exam.
Thank you Dr. It has returned to normal now.

question: Hi. I am 31. After having my baby 2 months ago i had post partum pre eclampsia with very high blood pressure. I just recently stopped my blood pressure med with the ok from my doctor now i noticed on a few occasions i. Would be sitting Down rrelaxing and start to feel a bit dizzy and then these dark black spots start to appear in my eye and last a few seconds then disappear after those happens i Will wake up and my eye Will be sore for a couple days. I know before giving birth i had my eyes checked due to diabetes and was told my vision was perfect so Im not sure what this is.
title: seeing black circles
